colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES TSE DBANG ZAB KHYAD CAN 'DI NYID KYANG GNAS MCHOG BKRA SHIS NGO BO'I CHER 'KHRUL SNANG DU BYUNG BA CUNG ZAD ZIN BRIS BGYIS KYANG BRGYUD RAL GYI DBANG DU LUS PA LA SLAR YANG BLA MA RDOR BSKYED KYIS NAN CHER BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BU STON DGE SLONG DHARMA KRI RTIS GZHI SPREL LUNG GI LCANG LO CAN DU BRIS PA'O,, ,,)
